mapper.select: select id, name,customer_id, status, city_id, install_type, address, camera_count, canopy_count, sn_no, card_number, remarks,create_uid,create_time, del_flag from t_point_new where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_point_new(name,customer_id, status, city_id, install_type, address, camera_count, canopy_count, sn_no, card_number, remarks,create_uid,create_time, del_flag, card_supplier, completion_time, is_entry, is_acceptance, order_source, order_time, operator, logistics_info, product_info, camera_info) values (#{name},#{customerId}, #{status}, #{cityId}, #{installType}, #{address}, #{cameraCount}, #{canopyCount}, #{snNo}, #{cardNumber},#{remarks},#{createUid},#{createTime}, #{delFlag}, #{cardSupplier}, #{completionTime}, #{isEntry}, #{isAcceptance},#{orderSource},#{orderTime},#{operator}, #{logisticsInfo},#{productInfo},#{cameraInfo})
mapper.update:
update t_point_new
name = #{name},
customer_id = #{customerId},
status = #{status},
city_id = #{cityId},
install_type = #{installType},
address = #{address},
camera_count = #{cameraCount},
canopy_count = #{canopyCount},
sn_no = #{snNo},
card_number = #{cardNumber},
remarks = #{remarks},
create_uid = #{createUid},
create_time = #{createTime},
install_time = #{installTime},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
card_supplier = #{cardSupplier},
completion_time = #{completionTime},
is_entry = #{isEntry},
is_acceptance = #{isAcceptance},
order_source = #{orderSource},
order_time = #{orderTime},
operator = #{operator},
logistics_info = #{logisticsInfo},
product_info = #{productInfo},
camera_info = #{cameraInfo},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update t_point_new set del_flag = 1 where id = #{id}

update.foreach:
update t_point_new
name = #{pointNew.name},
status = #{pointNew.status},
city_id = #{pointNew.cityId},
create_time = #{pointNew.createTime},
del_flag = #{pointNew.delFlag},
customer_id = #{pointNew.customerId}, install_type = #{pointNew.installType}, address = #{pointNew.address}, camera_count = #{pointNew.cameraCount}, canopy_count = #{pointNew.canopyCount}, sn_no = #{pointNew.snNo}, card_number = #{pointNew.cardNumber}, card_supplier = #{pointNew.cardSupplier}, remarks = #{pointNew.remarks}, create_uid = #{pointNew.createUid}, completion_time = #{pointNew.completionTime}, is_entry = #{pointNew.isEntry}, is_acceptance = #{pointNew.isAcceptance}, order_source = #{pointNew.orderSource}, order_time = #{pointNew.orderTime}, operator = #{pointNew.operator}, logistics_info = #{pointNew.logisticsInfo}
where id = #{pointNew.id};
